response.overview: The story happens in present day, about some present people.  What happens if a frustrated reporter met a prostitute who always through her weight around? We don’t know for sure. But in this film, we see friendship growing between two different women. I don’t know if this can be related to homosexuality, but we know for sure that love has no limits in front of destiny.  Two different women, one is a reporter, the other is a prostitute, but they both have to struggle against their lives and destiny. The reality is complex, makes their lives joined up together and separated apart.  The past and love are twisted, who will be the one there when she looks back? When they meet again, will the story starts again?
response.title: Meet You Again
